faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Overview and principal knowledge about the history The Republic of Poland is given. Its culture and the nowadays state and administrative system is discussed.
description.et: Ülevaade Poola Vabariigi ajaloost ja kultuurielust, geograafiast, kaasaegsest riigikorraldusest ning administratiivsüsteemist.

objectives.en:
The aim of the course is to give an overview and principal knowledge about the history of Republic of Poland, its culture and its development today. To explain the basic aspects of polish culture and find its expression in literature, language, art and in other fields of culture and society.  Students will have a chance to present aspects relating to their interest. The purpose is to give students a systematisized survey of the processes that have influenced the development of the Polish intellectual and spiritual atmosphere through centuries. The approach is casual and comparative, the elements of the study include slavic mythology, religion, art, law system and various literary genres.

The material introduced during the course will widen philological and cultural competence and can be combined later with the knowledge in special courses.
objectives.et: Anda põhiteadmised Poola ajaloost, kultuurist ja nende tänapäeva seisundist.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the course the student
-	will have an overview and principal knowledge about the history The Republic of Poland, its culture and its development today.
learning_outcomes.et: - omab põhiteadmisi Poola ajaloost, kultuurist ja nende tänapäeva seisundist;

learning_outcomes.en: -	is able to search for the additional information and work with different information sources and deliver an independent research in the field.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab leida vajalikku lisainformatsiooni, suudab töötada erinevate infoallikatega ning teha iseseisvat tööd.

description.en: Various homeworks (mainly on Moodle) have been completed
description.et: Erinevad kodutööd (peamiselt Moodle'is) on sooritatud vähemalt 51% tulemusele.

description.en: Participation in a colloquium during the last class.
Presentation on a topic related to Poland chosen by the student
description.et: Ettekanne õpilase valitud Poolaga seotud teemal

grade_preconditions.en:
1. participation in classes (at least 55% of the meetings)
2. participation in the final colloquium
3. submission of all homework
4. presentation in the classroom
grade_preconditions.et:
1. osalemine tundides vähemalt 55% ulatuses
2. osalemine lõpukollokviumil
3. kõikide kodutööde esitamine
4. esitluse sooritamine

grade_evaluation.en:
a) oral presentation on a chosen topic (at least 15 min) (40%)
b) participation in activities during the classes (20%)
c) participation in the final colloquium (20%)
d) homework (20%)
grade_evaluation.et:
a) suuline ettekanne valitud teemal (vähemalt 15 min) (40%)
b) aktiivne osavõtt tundidest (20%)
c) osalemine lõpukollokviumil (20%)
d) kodutööd (20%)

debt_elimination.en: By prior arrangement with the teacher.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
